Package lubiku.castleQuest.Model.Parents

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
lubiku.castleQuest.Model.Parents.Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Hero, Monster, NPC
public class Entity extends Object

Entity

The Entity class represents a game entity with position, attributes, and behaviors. It provides methods to manipulate and interact with the entity.

  • Constructor Details

    • Entity

      public Entity(GamePanel GAME_PANEL)

      Entity

      Constructs an Entity object with the specified GamePanel.
      Parameters:
      GAME_PANEL - The GamePanel associated with the entity.

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D graphics2D, GamePanel gamePanel)

      draw

      Draws the entity on the graphics context.
      Parameters:
      graphics2D - The graphics context to draw on.
      gamePanel - The game panel.

    • setUpCurrentSprite

      public void setUpCurrentSprite(Entity entity, String direction)

      setUpCurrentSprite

      Sets up the current sprite image for the entity based on the specified direction.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity.
      direction - The direction of movement.

    • setUpCurrentHeroSprite

      public void setUpCurrentHeroSprite(Hero hero, String direction, boolean isAttacking)

      setUpCurrentHeroSprite

      Sets up the current sprite image for the hero based on the specified direction and attack state.
      Parameters:
      hero - The hero entity.
      direction - The direction of movement.
      isAttacking - Indicates if the hero is currently attacking.

    • allowMoveEntity

      public void allowMoveEntity(Entity entity, boolean isCollision, String direction, boolean isENTERPressed)

      allowMoveEntity

      Allows the entity to move based on the provided parameters. If there is no collision and the ENTER key is not pressed, the entity's position is updated according to the specified direction.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity to move.
      isCollision - Indicates if there is a collision.
      direction - The direction in which the entity should move.
      isENTERPressed - Indicates if the ENTER key is pressed.

    • handleInvisibility

      public void handleInvisibility(Entity entity, boolean isInvisible)

      handleInvisibility

      Handles the invisibility of an entity. If the entity is currently invisible, it increments the invisibility counter. If the counter exceeds 60, the entity is set back to visible and the counter is reset.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity to handle invisibility for.
      isInvisible - Indicates if the entity is currently invisible.
